oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of clothing, camp and garrison equipage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 2nd Lt. Thomas E. Hallack, Acting Regt. Quartermaster, 10th Tenn. Inf., USA, transferred items to 1st Lt. Jos. Tucker, Co. F, 10th Tenn. Inf., USA at Knoxville, Tenn. Items listed included hats, trousers, sack coats, shirts, drawers, bootees, stockings, woolen blankets, rubber blankets, canteens, and haversacks.
